alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 8:29PM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Cameron and Clearfield Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow could fall heavily at times between noon and 6 pm, with much lighter snow after 7 pm.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel as significant winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
